{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the relevant documents, the soft palate is composed of muscle fibers sheathed in mucous membrane. It also consists of five muscles: Tensor veli palatini, Palatoglossus, Palatopharyngeus, Levator veli palatini, and Musculus uvulae. Therefore, the soft palate is made up of both mucous membrane and muscles.", "answer_choice": "C"}
